name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；如果处理直接提交到URL的表单，则非常有用

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

options.desc: Array of Objects defining each option

attrs.desc: Key-value for attributes to be set on the button
attrs.desc_cn: 要在按钮上设置的属性的键值

label.desc: Label of option button; Use this prop and/or 'icon', but at least one is required
label.desc_cn: 选项按钮标签；使用此属性和/或“icon”，但至少需要一个

icon.desc: Icon of option button; Use this prop and/or 'label', but at least one is required
icon.desc_cn: 选项按钮图标；使用此道具和/或“label”，但至少需要一个

value.desc: Value of the option that will be used by component model
value.desc_cn: 组件模型将使用的选项的值

slot.desc: Slot name to use for this button content; Useful for customizing content or even add tooltips
slot.desc_cn: 用于此按钮内容的插槽名称；用于自定义内容甚至添加工具提示

...props.desc: Any other QBtn props (including class and style)
...props.desc_cn: 任何其他QBtn属性（包括类和样式）

options.desc_cn: 定义每个选项的对象数组

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette
text-color.desc_cn: 覆盖文本颜色（如果需要）；来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

toggle-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
toggle-color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

toggle-text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette
toggle-text-color.desc_cn: 覆盖文本颜色（如果需要）；来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

spread.desc: Spread horizontally to all available space
spread.desc_cn: 水平扩展到所有可用空间

rounded.desc: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button
rounded.desc_cn: 为方形按钮应用更突出的border-radius

size.desc: Button size name or a CSS unit including unit name
size.desc_cn: 按钮大小名称或包含单元名称的CSS单元

padding.desc: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set
padding.desc_cn: 应用自定义填充（垂直[水平]）；以CSS单位表示的尺寸，包括单位名称或标准尺寸名称（none | xs | sm | md | lg | xl）；设置时也会删除最小宽度和高度

no-caps.desc: Avoid turning label text into caps (which happens by default)
no-caps.desc_cn: 避免将标签文本转换为大写（默认情况下会发生这种情况）

ripple.desc: Configure material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object)
examples: { early: true, center: true, color: 'teal', keyCodes: [] }
ripple.desc_cn: 配置material波动（通过将其设置为“false”或提供配置对象将其禁用）

dense.desc_cn: 紧凑模式，占用更少的空间

stack.desc: Stack icon and label vertically instead of on same line (like it is by default)
stack.desc_cn: 垂直堆叠图标和标签，而不是在同一行上（就像默认情况下一样）

stretch.desc: When used on flexbox parent, button will stretch to parent's height
stretch.desc_cn: 当用于flexbox父元素时，按钮将拉伸到父元素的高度

clearable.desc: Clears model on click of the already selected button
clearable.desc_cn: 单击清除已选择按钮的模型

....desc: Any other dynamic slots to be used with 'slot' property of the 'options' prop

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

clear.desc: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the already selected button is clicked
clear.desc_cn: 使用“clearable”属性时，单击已选择的按钮时会发出此事件
